courseDetails.title: Individual Income Tax Form 1040 Comprehensive Problem
courseDetails.shortDescription: Construct a complex tax return step by step with a Certified Public Accountant CPA
courseDetails.longDescription:
This is a project based income tax course.

We will construct a complex tax return in a step by step format, beginning with a basic return & building complexity as we move forward.

The course will demonstrate the data input within 2020 income tax forms as well as the use of an Excel worksheet to check the numbers and demonstrate the use of tax software.

Using tax software & an Excel worksheet, formatted as the income tax equation, are common, and best practices for many tax professionals, practices that greatly increase understanding and accuracy.

The practice problem with start by using basic tax data input forms such as W-2 forms and Form 1099s. We will then add a Schedule A Itemized Deductions. The problem will eventually include a Schedule C Sole Proprietorship and Schedule E Rental Income or Loss.

The materials for the course will include example tax forms after many of the steps in the practice problem. We will also include an Excel worksheet template that will be used in the instructional videos.

We will be using Lacerte tax software. You are not required to have Lacerte tax software to follow along. If you do not have tax software you can still follow along using tax forms from the IRS website and use the Excel worksheet. Other tax software can also be used in a similar way.

In some cases Lacerte may offer a free 30-day trial period of the tax software.
targetAudiences: Tax Professionals
Tax Students
Individual Taxpayers

courseDetails.title: Certified Chief Human Resources Officer (CHRO)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Certified Chief Human Resources Officer (CHRO) Certification & Assessment by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Certified Chief Human Resources Officer (CHRO) Assessment

This assessment helps to employees and companies in internal certification procedures.

Its not a course with theory, its exam for certification / assessment


Udemy doesn't provide certificates for exam type of courses yet. You may:

  1. Include info about Assessment / Certification to your CV / Linked in (with choosing of Institute of Management, Technology and Finance as a Educational Provider) after successful finishing of test

  2. Write to welcome@gtf.pt with screens of finished tests for getting of MTF type of diploma
    please also provide name/surname at Udemy and your preferred name for diploma


Assessment Description:

The role of a Chief Human Resources Officer (CHRO) holds immense significance in an organization, as they are responsible for managing the most valuable asset: the employees. A well-designed CHRO assessment plays a crucial role in identifying and selecting the right candidate for this critical position. This description will highlight the importance of a CHRO assessment for both employees and companies, emphasizing how effective human resources management can contribute to career development.


Professional Growth and Development: A CHRO assessment ensures that the chosen candidate possesses the necessary knowledge, skills, and experience to lead the human resources function effectively. Employees can benefit from the expertise of a competent CHRO, who can guide them in areas like performance management, training and development, and career advancement opportunities.


Employee Engagement and Well-being: A proficient CHRO understands the significance of employee engagement and implements strategies to foster a positive work environment. By prioritizing employee well-being and job satisfaction, the CHRO enhances overall employee experience, leading to increased productivity, motivation, and loyalty.


Talent Management and Succession Planning: A skilled CHRO will focus on talent acquisition, retention, and development, ensuring a robust succession planning process. This creates opportunities for employees to progress within the organization, fostering a culture of internal growth and career advancement.


Diversity and Inclusion Initiatives: An effective CHRO champions diversity and inclusion, ensuring equal opportunities for all employees. By implementing programs that promote diversity, such as recruitment initiatives and training programs, employees can benefit from a more inclusive and supportive work environment.


Importance for Companies:


Strategic Alignment: A CHRO assessment helps companies identify candidates who possess the strategic mindset required to align human resources objectives with overall business goals. This ensures that HR initiatives contribute to the organization's success and long-term growth.


Talent Acquisition and Retention: A competent CHRO is instrumental in attracting, selecting, and retaining top talent. Through the assessment process, companies can identify CHRO candidates who excel in building robust recruitment and retention strategies, leading to a talented workforce and reduced turnover.


Culture and Employee Morale: The CHRO plays a critical role in shaping and nurturing the company culture. By assessing candidates' cultural fit, companies can select a CHRO who will create a positive work environment, fostering high employee morale and satisfaction.


Compliance and Risk Management: A skilled CHRO ensures compliance with labor laws, regulations, and ethical standards. An effective CHRO assessment verifies the candidate's understanding of employment laws and their ability to mitigate risks associated with HR practices, protecting the company from potential legal and reputational issues.


Organizational Performance: The CHRO's expertise in areas such as performance management, talent development, and employee engagement directly impacts overall organizational performance. By selecting a competent CHRO, companies can enhance productivity, innovation, and efficiency, leading to sustainable business success.


The Importance of Human Resources Management for Career Building:


Human resources management plays a crucial role in career development, regardless of the level within an organization. It offers several benefits:


Professional Guidance and Support: HR professionals provide guidance in various areas, including performance management, career planning, and skill development. They help employees align their goals with organizational objectives, identify growth opportunities, and develop necessary competencies.


Training and Development Opportunities: HR departments are responsible for organizing training and development programs that enhance employees' skills and knowledge. These initiatives equip employees with the tools they need to excel in their current roles and prepare for future career advancements.


Performance Evaluation and Feedback: HR professionals are involved in performance evaluations, providing valuable feedback to employees on their strengths and areas for improvement. This feedback is instrumental in career development, as it helps individuals understand their progress and make necessary adjustments.


Employee Engagement and Recognition: HR professionals create initiatives that foster employee engagement, recognition, and rewards. These programs contribute to job satisfaction and motivate employees to achieve their career aspirations.


Career Pathing and Succession Planning: HR departments play a key role in career pathing and succession planning. They identify high-potential employees, create development plans, and provide guidance on potential career advancement opportunities within the organization.


A comprehensive CHRO assessment ensures the selection of a qualified professional who can effectively manage an organization's human resources. This benefits both employees and companies, as it facilitates professional growth, improves employee engagement, enhances talent management practices, and aligns HR strategies with overall business goals. Moreover, human resources management, as a discipline, offers valuable support and resources to employees, aiding in their career development by providing guidance, training, performance evaluation, and growth opportunities.

courseDetails.title: Excel Accounting Problem
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn How to Create an Accounting Worksheet Using Microsoft Excel from a Certified Public Accountant (CPA)
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course will walk through a comprehensive accounting problem using Microsoft Excel in a step-by-step process. You may also use another spreadsheet software like Google Sheets.

Learners will learn how to navigate Microsoft Excel as well as how to create a well-designed accounting worksheet, complete with a general journal, trial balance, general ledger, subsidiary ledgers for accounts receivable, accounts payable, & inventory, financial statements and much more.

Excel is a very good tool to learn accounting because it is much more transparent than a database program, like accounting software, QuickBooks being a common example of accounting software.

As we enter transactions into our Microsoft Excel worksheet, we will discuss how the data input would commonly be entered into accounting software like QuickBooks and what data input forms would normally drive the transactions.

The course will start out from a blank Excel Worksheet. We will build the outline for our accounting system from the blank spreadsheet.

For each new step in the process, you will have access to a downloadable Excel Workbook, containing at least two tabs, one with the answer, the new steps being completed, the other starting out where the prior presentation left off.

Therefore, you can complete the entire problem starting from one blank spreadsheet, or you can jump forward in the problem and rework any component of the problem by downloading the related worksheet at that point in the process.

After constructing the outline of our accounting worksheet, the first section will discuss the most common accounting transactions and the data input form often used in accounting software, like QuickBooks, to enter them, common data input forms including invoice, bill, deposit. . .

We will then start our comprehensive problem, constructing a new Excel worksheet and entering beginning balances into it, imagining that we had a prior accounting system which we are now converting to our new accounting system in Excel.

We will then enter two-months worth of data input. When entering the accounting data we will create the journal entry, post it to the trial balance, giving us a good look at which accounts are impacted, post to the general ledger, and make adjustments to any subsidiary ledgers needed.

We will also update the financial statements periodically.

For the second month of operations, we create a bit more complex trial balance, allowing us to calculate both the year-to-date numbers, including both months of data input, and the current period numbers, showing income statement accounts for just the second month of operations.

After entering two months of data input, we will process two bank reconciliations, using mock bank statements. As we construct our bank reconciliations, we will discuss how accounting software often accomplishes this task.

Next, we will adjust our worksheet to enter period end adjusting journal entries as well as reversing entries. For each adjusting entry we will consider the reasons for it and how to set up the accounting system so that our adjusting entries do not mess up the data input process in the accounting department.

After entering the adjusting entries we will construct our financial statements.
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to learn Excel, real world practice problems being the best tool
Anybody learning accounting or bookkeeping
Anybody who uses accounting software like QuickBooks and wants to understand what the software is doing
Accounting students and professionals

courseDetails.title: Residential Rental Property Tax Preparation 2022-2023
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn income tax preparation related to rental property form a certified public accountant (CPA)
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course will focus on tax preparation related to rental real property.

We will look at each new concept from multiple angles, starting with a presentation discussing the topic and then looking at examples to better understand the concepts in action.

The example section will use tax forms to work problems and an accounting equation method using Excel so learners will understand the impact on the actual tax return and visualize the concepts using a tax formula.

We will start with an introduction to residential rental property and go over what’s new.

Learners will understand what constitutes rental income and expenses for a situation where there is no personal use of the dwelling. We will understand when to deduct and what the most common deductions are.

Learners will understand the concept of points and the tax implications.

The course will discuss the concept of depreciation, providing examples using tax forms and worksheets to solidify the information.

We will discuss the concept of basis and how it is calculated. Learners will understand what rental property can be depreciated and well as when depreciation should begin and end. The course will outline depreciation methods and how to determine the proper one for a particular situation.

We will also discuss reporting rental income, expenses, and losses. Learners will know which forms to use. The course will cover Schedule E and provide example presentations demonstrating the form.

We will also discuss loss limitation rules.
targetAudiences: Investors in residential real estate
Tax professionals
Business, accounting, and tax students

courseDetails.title: Python with NumPy For Absolute Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Python & Numpy with simple videos
courseDetails.longDescription:
NumPy is a basic level external library in Python used for complex mathematical operations. NumPy overcomes slower executions with the use of multi-dimensional array objects. It has built-in functions for manipulating arrays. We can convert different algorithms to can into functions for applying on arrays. NumPy has applications that are not only limited to itself. It is a very diverse library and has a wide range of applications in other sectors. Numpy can be put to use along with Data Science, Data Analysis and Machine Learning. It is also a base for other python libraries. These libraries use the functionalities in NumPy to increase their capabilities.


This course introduce with all majority of concept of NumPy - numerical python library.

You will learn following topics :

1) Creating Arrays using Numpy in Python

2) Accessing Arrays using Numpy in Python

3) Finding Dimension of the Array using Numpy in Python

4) Negative Indexing on Arrays using Numpy in Python

5) Slicing an Array using Numpy in Python

6) Checking Datatype of an Array using Numpy in Python

7) Copying an Array using Numpy in Python

8) Iterating through arrays using Numpy in Python

9) Shape of Arrays using Numpy in Python

10) Reshaping Arrays using Numpy in Python

11) Joining Arrays using Numpy in Python

12) Splitting Array using Numpy in Python

13) Sorting an Array using Numpy in Python

14) Searching in Array using Numpy in Python

15) Filtering an Array using Numpy in Python

16) Generating a Random Array using Numpy in Python



The Numpy arrays are homogenous sets of elements. The most important feature of NumPy arrays is they are homogenous in nature. This differentiates them from python arrays. It maintains uniformity for mathematical operations that would not be possible with heterogeneous elements. Another benefit of using NumPy arrays is there are a large number of functions that are applicable to these arrays. These functions could not be performed when applied to python arrays due to their heterogeneous nature.




Happy learning

Surendra Varma Pericherla

It helps employers and organizations identify professionals who possess the necessary expertise to fulfill the role of a Product Owner in a Scrum team.


To earn the PSPO1 certification, individuals are required to pass an online assessment consisting of multiple-choice questions that evaluate their comprehension of Scrum theory, product value management, stakeholder management, and other relevant topics. The exam assesses both the individual's theoretical knowledge and their ability to apply Scrum principles in practical scenarios.


By obtaining the PSPO1 certification, professionals demonstrate their commitment to continuous learning and their dedication to advancing their skills as Product Owners. It signifies that they have a solid understanding of Scrum and are capable of effectively managing product backlogs, defining product vision, prioritizing requirements, and collaborating with stakeholders to deliver value.

courseDetails.title: Professional Agile Leadership P AL / PAL-I  Practice Exams
courseDetails.shortDescription: Increase confident and chance to pass the real exam PAL | PAL 1 | PAL-I
courseDetails.longDescription:
Professional Agile Leadership (PAL I) certification is a program that aims to recognize the knowledge and skills of professionals who work in leadership roles in an Agile environment. The certification validates an individual's ability to lead Agile organizations, manage Agile projects, and promote Agile principles and values within their organization.

The PAL I certification exam focuses on key areas such as Agile leadership, culture and mindset, strategy and tactics, and Agile frameworks and methodologies. The exam assesses candidates' understanding of Agile principles, the Scrum framework, Kanban, Lean, and other Agile approaches, as well as their ability to apply Agile practices to different situations.

To be eligible for the PAL I certification, candidates must have a minimum of three years of Agile and/or leadership experience. They must also have completed the PAL I course which covers key Agile leadership concepts, principles, and practices.

The PAL I certification is ideal for Agile coaches, Scrum Masters, project managers, executives, and anyone in a leadership role who wants to improve their understanding of Agile and its application to their organization.


The learning objectives of the Professional Agile Leadership (PAL I) certification include:

  1. Understanding Agile leadership: This includes understanding the role of leadership in Agile organizations, the difference between traditional and Agile leadership, and the importance of creating an Agile culture.

  2. Developing an Agile mindset: This involves understanding the values and principles of Agile, and how they can be applied to leadership and management.

  3. Applying Agile frameworks and methodologies: This includes understanding the Scrum framework, Kanban, Lean, and other Agile approaches, and how they can be used to manage projects and teams.

  4. Creating an Agile strategy: This involves developing an Agile roadmap and vision, and aligning organizational goals with Agile practices.

  5. Managing Agile teams: This includes understanding how to create self-organizing teams, manage team dynamics, and foster collaboration and communication.

  6. Promoting Agile values and principles: This involves understanding how to communicate the benefits of Agile to stakeholders, and how to promote a culture of continuous improvement.

The Professional Agile Leadership (PAL I) certification exam is an online, timed exam that consists of 36 multiple-choice questions. Candidates have 60 minutes to complete the exam, and must score at least 85% (31 correct answers out of 36) to pass.


WHY CHOOSE THIS COURSE?

The practice tests have some duplicated and repeated questions but it has own purpose to let you remember and repeat the correct choice. The questions here are VERY SIMILAR to the real test, so please practice again and again until you WIN 90%. If you can pass the exam here with 90%, then you will pass the real exam, SURE.
targetAudiences: Professionals who work in leadership roles in Agile environments.

courseDetails.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect-Professional - Mock Exams
courseDetails.shortDescription: Pass the exam on your first attempt with a great score - Frequently Updated Questions ( AWS SAP-C02 | SAP C02 )
courseDetails.longDescription:
The AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional ( SAP-C02 ) exam is intended for individuals who perform a solutions architect role. The exam validates a candidate’s advanced technical skills and experience in designing optimized AWS solutions that are based on the AWS Well-Architected Framework.

The exam also validates a candidate’s ability to complete the following tasks within the scope of the AWS Well-Architected Framework:

• Design for organizational complexity

• Design for new solutions

• Continuously improve existing solutions

• Accelerate workload migration and modernization


AWS Solutions Architect Professional practice tests included in this course contains 75 questions per set, which simulate the latest version of the actual exam and the time-slot for each, help you to practice more and more before taking the real exam with the best performance.


Exam content

There are two types of questions on the exam:

• Multiple choice: Has one correct response and three incorrect responses (distractors)

• Multiple response: Has two or more correct responses out of five or more response options

The exam includes 65 questions that will affect your score and 10 unscored questions that do not affect your score.

Your results for the exam are reported as a scaled score of 100–1,000. The minimum passing score is 750.
targetAudiences: Individuals who perform a solutions architect role

courseDetails.title: Professional Scrum Master PSM 1 / PSM1 Mock Exams | 2023
courseDetails.shortDescription: Increase confident and chance to pass the real exam PSM 1 | PSM1 | PSM I
courseDetails.longDescription:
The Professional Scrum Master level 1 (PSM1) certification is designed for individuals who want to demonstrate their knowledge and understanding of Scrum principles and practices. It validates their ability to effectively apply Scrum in real-world situations and serve as effective Scrum Masters within their organizations.

To earn the PSM1 certification, individuals need to pass an online assessment that evaluates their understanding of various Scrum concepts, including roles, artifacts, events, and the underlying principles of Scrum. The assessment consists of multiple-choice questions and requires a thorough understanding of Scrum theory and its practical application.


Our practice exams are designed to help candidates prepare for the actual certification exam. A mock exam consists of questions and answers that are similar in style, format, and difficulty level to those found in the real certification exam.

The PSM1 exam is taken online and you only have 60 minutes to attempt 80 questions. You must have at least 68 correct answers to pass the exam. You ideally get 45 sec per Question. It is essential to be as familiarized as possible with these concepts as time is limited and many candidates end up leaving some questions unanswered.


Here are some tips that can help you prepare for and pass the certification exam:

  1. Understand the exam objectives: The exam objectives provide a detailed breakdown of the topics that will be covered on the exam. Make sure you understand each objective and are familiar with the tools and techniques used in each area.

  2. Take practice exams: Practice exams are an excellent way to assess your knowledge and identify areas where you need to improve. You can practice our practice tests as many as you want until pass all the test with 85%.

  3. Study the exam materials: The official exam study guide is a valuable resource that can help you prepare for the exam. It covers all the exam objectives and provides examples and scenarios to help you understand how the concepts apply in real-world situations.

  4. Familiarize yourself with the exam format: Understanding the format of the exam can help you manage your time effectively and reduce stress during the exam. Familiarize yourself with the types of questions and the amount of time you will have to complete each section.

  5. Practice good test-taking strategies: Make sure you read the questions carefully, eliminate obviously wrong answers, and manage your time effectively during the exam. Don't spend too much time on a single question and make sure you answer all questions before the time is up.
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to get PSM1 certificate

courseDetails.title: AWS Certified Database Specialty ( DBS-C01 ) Practice Exams
courseDetails.shortDescription: Pass the exam on your first attempt with a great score - Frequently Updated Questions ( AWS DBS-C01 | DBS C01 )
courseDetails.longDescription:
This certification Learning Path is specifically designed to prepare you for the AWS Certified Database - Specialty (DBS-C01) released in April 2020. It covers all the elements required across all of the domains outlined in the exam blueprint. Throughout this learning path, you will be guided via our courses, hands-on labs, lab challenges, and a preparation exam at the end, all of which are focused on areas that will be assessed within the exam.

As defined by AWS, the aim of the certification is to validate your knowledge by being able to:

  • Understand and differentiate the key features of AWS database services.

  • Analyze needs and requirements to design and recommend appropriate database solutions using AWS services.

As a means of demonstrating this knowledge, you will be tested across 5 different domains, with each domain contributing to a total percentage of your overall score. These domains are broken down as:

Domain 1: Workload-Specific Database Design 26%

Domain 2: Deployment and Migration 20%

Domain 3: Management and Operations 18%

Domain 4: Monitoring and Troubleshoot 18%

Domain 5: Database Security 18%


To earn this certification, you’ll need to take and pass the AWS Certified Database – Specialty exam (DBS-C01). The exam features a combination of two question formats: multiple choice and multiple response

Level: Specialty

Length: 180 minutes to complete the exam

Cost: 300 USD

Format: 65 questions; either multiple choice or multiple response.
targetAudiences: IT Professionals who are planning to take the AWS Certified Database Specialty exam

courseDetails.title: Certified Chief Technology Officer (CTO)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Certified Chief Technology Officer (CTO) Certification & Assessment by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Certified Chief Technology Officer (CTO) Assessment

That assessment helps to employees and companies in internal certification procedures.

Its not a course with theory, its exam for certification / assessment


Udemy doesn't provide certificates for exam type of courses yet. You may:

  1. Include info about Assessment / Certification to your CV / Linked in (with choosing of Institute of Management, Technology and Finance as a Educational Provider) after successful finishing of test

  2. Write to welcome@gtf.pt with screens of finished tests for getting of MTF type of diploma
    please also provide name/surname at Udemy and your preferred name for diploma


Assessment Description:

The Chief Technology Officer (CTO) assessment is designed to evaluate the knowledge, skills, and expertise of individuals aspiring to or currently holding the position of a CTO. This assessment consists of 30 questions, each with four answer options, and only one correct answer marked. The purpose of this assessment is to gauge the candidate's understanding of various aspects of technology, including programming languages, network protocols, cloud computing, security, software development methodologies, and more.


Importance of CTO Assessment for Employees:

Skill Validation: The CTO assessment allows employees to validate their technical skills and knowledge in the field of technology management. It helps them assess their strengths and weaknesses, identify areas for improvement, and take necessary steps to enhance their expertise.

Career Advancement: A successful CTO assessment can open up new opportunities for career advancement. It demonstrates competence and proficiency in technology management, which can be leveraged for promotions, salary increases, and higher-level responsibilities within an organization.

Professional Development: Preparing for the CTO assessment requires individuals to delve deeper into various technological domains. This process enhances their understanding and keeps them up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in the industry. It fosters continuous learning and professional growth.

Credibility and Recognition: A strong performance in the CTO assessment enhances an employee's credibility and establishes them as a reliable and knowledgeable professional in the field. It can lead to increased recognition within their organization and the broader industry.


Importance of CTO Assessment for Companies:

Hiring and Recruitment: The CTO assessment plays a crucial role in the hiring and recruitment process for organizations seeking to fill the CTO position. It helps identify candidates with the necessary technical expertise, strategic thinking, and problem-solving abilities required for effective technology management.

Ensuring Competency: Assessing the knowledge and skills of CTO candidates through the assessment ensures that the selected individual possesses the requisite competencies to drive technology initiatives and make informed decisions that align with the organization's goals and objectives.

Risk Mitigation: Technology plays a critical role in modern businesses, and an ineffective CTO can pose significant risks to an organization's infrastructure, security, and overall technological direction. The assessment helps mitigate such risks by ensuring that the CTO possesses the necessary expertise to navigate complex technological challenges and make sound decisions.

Innovation and Growth: A competent CTO is instrumental in driving innovation and technological growth within an organization. The assessment helps identify candidates who can lead and implement cutting-edge technologies, foster a culture of innovation, and align technology initiatives with the organization's strategic objectives.

Competitive Advantage: In today's digital landscape, companies need to stay ahead of the curve in terms of technology adoption and utilization. A skilled CTO can provide a competitive advantage by leveraging emerging technologies, optimizing processes, and driving digital transformation. The assessment aids in selecting the right candidate for such a crucial role.


Technology Management and Career Building:

Proficiency in technology management is highly beneficial for career development in various ways:

Strategic Leadership: Technology management equips professionals with the skills to strategically align technology initiatives with organizational goals. This expertise positions individuals for leadership roles, where they can drive innovation, influence decision-making, and contribute to the long-term success of their organizations.

Cross-Disciplinary Collaboration: Technology management often involves collaboration with professionals from diverse fields, such as marketing, finance, operations, and human resources. A solid understanding of technology allows individuals to effectively communicate and collaborate across departments, facilitating career growth and expanding professional networks.

Adaptability and Agility: Technology is constantly evolving, and professionals well-versed in technology management are better prepared to adapt to changes and embrace emerging trends. This adaptability enhances career resilience and opens doors to opportunities in emerging fields and industries.

Problem-Solving and Innovation: Technology managers are often responsible for solving complex problems and driving innovation within their organizations. Building expertise in technology management equips individuals with problem-solving skills, creative thinking abilities, and a mindset geared towards continuous improvement.

Increased Marketability: In today's job market, employers value candidates who possess strong technological acumen. Proficiency in technology management enhances an individual's marketability and expands their career options across industries and sectors.


In conclusion, the CTO assessment plays a vital role in evaluating the knowledge and skills of individuals aspiring to or currently holding the position of a CTO. It benefits employees by validating their skills, facilitating career advancement, and fostering professional development. For companies, the assessment aids in hiring the right candidate, ensuring competency, mitigating risks, driving innovation, and gaining a competitive advantage. Building expertise in technology management is highly valuable for career development, offering strategic leadership opportunities, cross-disciplinary collaboration, adaptability, problem-solving abilities, and increased marketability in the job market.

  • top management

Storage and Persistence: Explore methods to save and access data persistently in Android apps.

Debugging and Testing: Discover essential debugging techniques and testing practices for bug-free apps.


Why Choose Our Course?

Hindi Language Instruction: Learn in your native language and grasp concepts more effectively.

Practical Projects: Gain hands-on experience by building 15 mini-applications from scratch.

Supportive Community: Join a vibrant community of learners to exchange ideas and get assistance when needed.

Lifetime Access: Enjoy lifetime access to the course materials and stay updated with any future updates.

Who Is This Course For?

Beginners: Individuals with no prior experience in app development, but are eager to learn and start their journey in Android app development in Hindi.

Hindi Speakers: Learners who prefer educational content in Hindi to enhance their understanding and retention of course material.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT pour Programmeurs : Applications Python sans Codage
courseDetails.shortDescription: Apprenez à utiliser ChatGPT pour générer et exécuter des programmes Python, automatiser des tâches informatiques sans co
courseDetails.longDescription:
Dans ce cours, vous apprendrez à utiliser ChatGPT pour simplifier et optimiser votre flux de travail en programmation. Grâce aux capacités de traitement du langage de pointe de ChatGPT, vous serez en mesure de construire, de résoudre des problèmes et d'ajouter des fonctionnalités à vos programmes en toute simplicité. Que vous ayez une bonne connaissance d'un langage de programmation ou que vous veniez de commencer et que vous éprouviez des difficultés, ChatGPT est là pour vous faciliter la tâche.

Ce cours est conçu pour les débutants, les programmeurs intermédiaires et avancés qui possèdent déjà une certaine expérience en programmation et qui souhaitent perfectionner leurs compétences. Si vous avez une compréhension de base des concepts de programmation et que vous avez déjà écrit du code par le passé, ce cours est parfait pour vous. Nous nous plongerons dans l'utilisation de ChatGPT en programmation et dans la manière dont il peut grandement simplifier et optimiser votre flux de travail. Vous aurez l'occasion de construire et d'améliorer des programmes avec facilité, et d'atteindre un nouveau niveau d'efficacité et de rapidité dans votre codage.

Nous commencerons par vous montrer comment écrire et exécuter des applications complètes avec ChatGPT, puis nous passerons à la résolution de problèmes dans des programmes existants, ce qui vous fera gagner beaucoup de frustration et d'heures interminables de débogage. Vous apprendrez également à améliorer des programmes existants, à ajouter de nouvelles fonctionnalités et à rendre le code plus efficace et lisible. Nous interrogerons ChatGPT pour créer des programmes Python, mais les instructions fonctionneront avec n'importe quel langage de programmation.

Et ce n'est pas tout ! Vous découvrirez également d'autres façons d'utiliser ChatGPT dans le domaine de la programmation, telles que l'écriture de documentation, l'apprentissage de nouveaux langages de programmation, voire la réalisation de votre emploi de rêve.

À la fin du cours, vous serez en mesure d'écrire du code à la vitesse de l'éclair et d'économiser d'innombrables heures que vous pourrez consacrer à d'autres choses. Avec ChatGPT, le ciel est la limite, et vous serez capable de créer n'importe quelle application que vous pouvez imaginer. Alors, n'attendez plus et rejoignez cette passionnante aventure pour révolutionner votre expérience en programmation !
targetAudiences: Débutants en programmation : Les personnes qui n'ont aucune expérience préalable en programmation, mais qui souhaitent apprendre à créer des applications Python sans avoir à écrire de code

Programmeurs intéressés par l'automatisation : Les programmeurs qui souhaitent explorer des moyens d'automatiser des tâches et de développer des applications rapidement en utilisant ChatGPT comme outil.

Créateurs d'applications non techniques : Les professionnels non techniques tels que les entrepreneurs, les chefs de projet ou les spécialistes du marketing qui souhaitent développer des applications Python sans avoir à apprendre une programmation approfondie.
Étudiants en informatique : Les étudiants qui souhaitent enrichir leur bagage de connaissances en découvrant une méthode alternative pour développer des applications Python.
